title: Cerebral - Mental Health
description:
Cerebral makes getting expert mental health care easy, personalized, and affordable. Choose a therapist or psychiatrist from our community of compassionate, highly qualified mental health professionals. Then start meeting with them to get a diagnosis, build a personalized treatment plan, and track your progress over time.

Most of our clients are able to start meeting with someone within 5 days of signing up.

THERAPY
- Initial evaluation and diagnosis
- Weekly 45-minute sessions with a qualified therapist
- Personalized treatment plans build to support your specific needs
- Message your therapist directly between sessions

MEDICATION
- Initial evaluation and diagnosis
- Medication prescription sent to pharmacy same-day if prescribed
- Monthly check-ins to discuss symptoms or ask questions
- Free 2-day shipping on medication in most states
- Save up to 80% on medication costs compared to national retail pharmacies

OTHER FEATURES IN THE APP
- Meet directly in the app through video chat or over the phone
- Book sessions easily online
- Medication and refill reminders
- Therapy session summaries
- Chat with your care team
- Progress and goal tracking
- Mindfulness exercises
- Additional resources to help you learn more about mental health

	CONDITIONS WE TREAT
	- Anxiety
	- Depression
	- Insomnia
	- Bipolar disorder
	- ADHD
	- PTSD and CPTSD
	And more

DISCLAIMER: Always seek a doctor’s advice before making any medical decisions about your mental health. Using this app without meeting with a therapist or prescriber does not qualify as professional healthcare advice.
